The claim is based on a Facebook post fe: 2. Other social media accounts also shared a Canadian website that featured the same image and headline, further promoting the claim.
Dr: Roger Chou, a Professor of Medical Informatics and Clinical Epidemiology, pointed out that the highlighted studies in the claim were cherry-picked and ignored other studies that showed the effectiveness of masks in preventing the spread of COVID-19.
The claim itself is misleadingly present: making four specific claims related to mask wearing, but the evidence provided does not fully support these claims.
